known_issues: Order 5038CO2600743-001 marked ready but not appearing in ready tab
JPEG and PDF export functionality failing

existing_features.title: Fix the JPEG export functionality in OrderTable and KarigarDetail components. Ensure the export process correctly generates JPEG files from order data without errors.

Fix the PDF export functionality in OrderTable and KarigarDetail components. Ensure the export process correctly generates PDF files from order data, including design images when available, without errors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Investigate and fix why order number 5038CO2600743-001 with Ready status is not appearing in the Ready tab dashboard. Verify the order status filtering logic in the backend query and frontend ReadyTab component to ensure all orders with Ready status are correctly retrieved and displayed.

projectName: Fix Ready tab order visibility and export functionality
